Field.tooltip: Please select the desired primary LED function.
Field.Label: LED Function:

List.Option: 0 - On with Alarms, Off with No Alarms

Field.tooltip: If LED is on, clicking the button will turn it off (and vice versa.)
Field.Title: Toggle Sensor LED
